t: I*pn will sing of mercy and justice; To*ld You, O Lord,*s I will sing praises.
I*ln will behave wisely in a perfect way. Oh,*ld when will You come to me? I*ld will walk within my house with a perfect heart.
I*ln will set nothing wicked before my eyes; I*ld hate the work of those who fall away; It*ld shall not cling to me.
A*ld perverse heart shall depart from me; I*ld will not know wickedness.
Whoever*ln secretly slanders his neighbor, Him*ld I will destroy; The*ld one who has a haughty look and a proud heart, Him*ld I will not endure.
My*ln eyes shall*i be*i on the faithful of the land, That*ld they may dwell with me; He*ld who walks in a perfect way, He*ld shall serve me.
He*ld who works deceit shall not dwell within my house; He*ld who tells lies shall not continue in my presence.
Early*ld I will destroy all the wicked of the land, That*ld I may cut off all the evildoers from the city of the Lord.*s
